forum.name: suggestions
forum.description: got a new feature idea for anyland, or anything that could be improved?
forum.latestCommentText: i wonder if the game can actually handle that many script lines.

comments.text: would be cool if there was an extra checkbox that would re-orient custom skybox textures and images relative to the thing they're based on. would allow for some cool animations
i.e. if this cone were pointing down the skybox would appear as-is; if i were to flip it pointing up in state two, it would appear to have flipped the same way on the skybox
if i added a delay to the animation between the two states, you could visibly see it rotate along a north- or whatever direction you flip it in's axis
this method could also be used alternatively to reduce texture clipping and warping during animations - due to the nature of the projected skybox's shape
absolutely. the more ways to script an area itself, the better.
